name: Superluminal Vagrant Twin
description:
Ply the spaceways. Make five million credits. Buy back your twin. A text adventure.

Type commands at the >. Sometimes the game will wait for you to press any key.

If you get stuck, enter the command "about". If you get lost, talk to Szymon. If you're using your own twin as collateral, feel bad about your life choices. >:(

Game window too small? There's a full-screen button in the bottom right.

Downloaded the .gblorb and don't know what to do with it? This page is supposed to explain it.
